title: Bloomberg Markets: White House Looking to Replace SSI Numbers
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: White House Looking to Replace SSI Numbers
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Nafeesa Syeed\u0010National Security Reporter \u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing the Trump administration exploring ways to replace the use of Social Security numbers as the main method of assuring people’s identities in the wake of consumer credit agency Equifax Inc.’s massive data breach.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
